trendingEvents.title: BLACKPINK WORLD TOUR < DEADLINE >IN BANGKOK
trendingEvents.description: A Korean artists beloved by fans around the world, BLACKPINK, have announced a new leg of their world tour, adding six major cities across Asia. Thai BLINKs are in for a treat! The girls are ready to fly to Rajamangala National Stadium for the long weekend on October 24, 2025, with the concert 'BLACKPINK WORLD TOUR <DEADLINE> IN BANGKOK', organized by Live Nation Tero.

trendingEvents.title: MAGICMAN 2 WORLD TOUR 2025-2026 in Bangkok Presented by Galaxy Resorts Thailand
trendingEvents.description: Jackson is determined to unleash his full potential in this concert, showcasing his musical talent, performances, and concept. He's also bringing his latest album, MAGICMAN2, to transform the stage into the 'MAGICMAN Universe,' brimming with emotion, passion, and his signature style. Fans won't be able to take their eyes off him for a second! So, don't forget to clear your schedule, warm up, and let's recharge together!

upcomingEvents.title: V+INK = WINK CONCERT
upcomingEvents.description: Get your fingers ready! Reserve your exclusive seats today in the hall with the most beautiful sound at the V+INK CONCERT. Come experience the sweet voices of INK (Ink Waruntorn) and V (V Violet) together for an unforgettable night. See you there..

nearbyEvents.title: Fell Good Fest
nearbyEvents.description: Feel Good Fest, the music festival with the most Feel Good vibes. Experience the fun of 3 Feels, 3 Styles: Light Feel, a chill rhythm, easy listening, enjoyable; Mid Feel, a rhythm with added steps for a stylish rocking style; Heavy Feel, a heavy rock rhythm that hits the heart.

nearbyEvents.title: TWICE < THIS IS FOR > WORLD TOUR in BANGKOK
nearbyEvents.description: This tour marks TWICE's return with their fourth full-length album : THIS IS FOR, which tells the story of the group's growth and gift to their fans with this album, conveying a fun and bright mood welcoming the Korean summer atmosphere. The girls performed the song at the global music festival Chicago earlier this August.
